channel.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
channel.description:
Anyone interested in starting a pathfinder campaign due to the virus?
I attempted running this adventure path for around 10 months on Discord ending last fall when it got canned because I ran out of time due to Marching Band.
I own both the first and second books of this AP and fully ran the first one last time and got like halfway through the second, so I'm very familiar with the lore and mechanics and can get this ready to go really fast, if people are interested and make characters.
Let me know!

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(anyone who wants to get in contact with me or send me a message, please refer to my updated bio here for the proper way to contact me)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(To increase the chances that Priestess rejoins the game, and also because I think it’s a good idea for me to stay logged out of and away from the forum for an extended period for my mental health as well, I have decided to move the textual component of this game to discord. I will be sending you three an invite link to the game on discord.
@Vulgard
@KyoDaz
@Magnus)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(eh
the last time i tried to run this game, it was at 3 players, and it went quite well for most of the first two books

obviously i’d like a fourth player, but it’s not absolutely necessary. im not going to can this game; i paid fifty bucks precisely and only for this campaign for a year’s worth of roll20 subscription, for advanced fog of war and dynamic lighting, which this game’s maps need. i got a token image and border request from magnus.

once everyone likes this post, i’ll retcon geyde and priestess out, and retcon magnus in, and continue the game.

@Vulgard
@KyoDaz
@Magnus

one more thing: @Ami, i know you’re extremely busy, but if you’re still interested in playing, the offer is still open. Your character can be puppeted by others a lot / a majority of the time, if/when needed.)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
(I’m completely fine with using a different platform if it comes to it. Of course I’d have to get used to the controls and whatnot if it was on Roll20 as I’ve never used it before. I’d be saddened to see this game canned but if it’s just not worth it in the long run then I’d understand.)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(So here’s the deal with this game. Priestess has decided to cease logging into the forums for a long time for mental health. She’s considering still being willing to play in this game if it was discord / roll20, google docs / roll20, or just roll20, but she’s still on the fence. Magnus has fluid activity levels even though I’d be willing to host this at 3P. therefore, i am on the fence as to whether or not to can the game. Please let me know your thoughts @Vulgard @KyoDaz ty)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(

Magnus:

Is the token just a headshot?

usually yes. You need to find an applicable image online for your character.
What kind of mobile do you have? As I said, Roll20 has an app for iPad and Android, but not iPhone.

if needed, I can post images here and you can direct me where to move your token.)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
(Thanks, I’m not going to have access to non-mobile for a while. Thinking darkred octagonal, don’t mind the texture. Is the token just a headshot?)

Read full topic

item.title: Pathfinder Campaign -- Tyrant's Grasp
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
(@Magnus i’ll just handle your token for you. Please find an image and post it here, and tell me what kind of border you want; describe color, texture, and do you want circular, octagonal, or square

also, roll20 exists for ipad and android, but not iphone)

Read full topic
